Changelog
=========

1.1 (2011-03-29)
----------------

* Don't break if email login is enabled [raphael]

* Extend test coverage to also check for member property changes
  being picked up in "content space" [robin].


1.0 - 2009-04-03
----------------

* Adding test suite [raphael].

* Adding MemberpropertyField for convenience [raphael].

* Breaking this out of ResearchCommunitySite to make it more accessible
  (from r15354 - yes, no changes in three years) [raphael].
